selected_quotes: More research on Curcumin anti-inflammatory effects.
El efecto antiinflamatorio de la cúrcuma
#Tumeric a spice used as an anti-inflammatory for many years and it may help reduce some forms of pain #ourpainworld
Papel de la curcumina en la #inflamación
Curcumin may inhibit molecules involved in inflammation including COX-2, TNF IL-12 .

citation.abstract: Tumeric is a spice that comes from the root Curcuma longa, a member of the ginger family, Zingaberaceae. In Ayurveda (Indian traditional medicine), tumeric has been used for its medicinal properties for various indications and through different routes of administration, including topically, orally, and by inhalation. Curcuminoids are components of tumeric, which include mainly curcumin (diferuloyl methane), demethoxycurcumin, and bisdemethoxycurcmin.
citation.title: Safety and anti-inflammatory activity of curcumin: a component of tumeric (Curcuma longa).

facebook.summary:
薑黃素可以抗發炎, 抗氧化, 抗老化, 而且從美國衛生部NIH贊助的臨床實驗證明, 每天服用超過8000毫克也沒有已知副作用, 也就是說, 把薑黃當主菜吃也不會中毒, 反而可以抗病, 美容, 養生, 對濕疹, 類風濕和各類自體免疫疾病, 都證實有不同程度的效果.

建議台灣人經常食用, 可以生吃, 水煮, 或製成粉末 (要標準化, 才能當成健康食品), 但不可以油炸或大火炒, 也可以幫助薑黃農民.

至於是不是有機, 不是最大的問題, 只要不號稱認證有機, 就沒有犯法.

http://www.ncbi.n
